org.apache.paimon.flink.source.assigners

Class PreAssignSplitAssigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.assigners.PreAssignSplitAssigner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SplitAssigner

    public class PreAssignSplitAssigner
extends Object
implements SplitAssigner
    Pre-calculate which splits each task should process according to the weight, and then distribute the splits fairly.

    • Method Detail

      • getNext

        public List<FileStoreSourceSplit> getNext(int subtask,
                                          @Nullable
                                          String hostname)
        Description copied from interface: SplitAssigner
        Gets the next split.

        When this method returns an empty Optional, then the set of splits is assumed to be done and the source will finish once the readers finished their current splits.

        Specified by:
        getNext in interface SplitAssigner

      • addSplitsBack

        public void addSplitsBack(int subtask,
                          List<FileStoreSourceSplit> splits)
        Description copied from interface: SplitAssigner
        Adds a set of splits to this assigner. This happens for example when some split processing failed and the splits need to be re-added, or when new splits got discovered.
        Specified by:
        addSplitsBack in interface SplitAssigner

        public int numberOfRemainingSplits()
        Description copied from interface: SplitAssigner
